description: The scammers sent WhatsApp messages and emails pretending to be Brad Pitt, promising future romantic relationships.
title: How a Fake Brad Pitt Scam Resulted in Losses of Over $300,000 and Multiple Arrests

description: This year, for the first time, TIME will debut a ranking of the World’s Top GreenTech Companies, in partnership with Statista, a leading international provider of market and consumer data and rankings, alongside its second annual ranking of America’s Top GreenTech Companies. These lists will recognize the most innovative, impactful, and successful companies whose aim…
title: TIME Is Looking For the World’s Top GreenTech Companies

description: The viral message shared by hundreds of thousands of social media users, including a number of celebrities, won’t legally protect your data.
title: No, Resharing That Viral ‘Goodbye Meta AI’ Post Will Not Legally Protect Your Social Media Data
